subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets traded the disgruntled point guard Jeff McInnis to the Charlotte Bobcats Wednesday for the swingman Bernard Robinson so they could move under the N.B.A.’s luxury-tax threshold.
snippet: The Nets traded the disgruntled point guard Jeff McInnis to the Charlotte Bobcats Wednesday for the swingman Bernard Robinson so they could move under the N.B.A.’s luxury-tax threshold.
